FuncDef: This command specifies a range of IP addresses that excluded from the pool of IP addresses in this subnet.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the start address of this range to exclude. This address must be unique within the subnet and specified in dotted decimal notation. Allowed values are IP addresses in the range 1.0.0.0 - 223.255.255.255 (with support of /31 subnets).

Specifies the end address of this range to exclude. This address must be unique within the subnet and specified in dotted decimal notation. Allowed values are IP addresses in the range 1.0.0.0 - 223.255.255.255 (with support of /31 subnets).
